title: Noam Chomsky interview on his Philosophy (2010)
description:
Noam Chomsky speaks with Sasha Lilley about his life and political philosophy, looking back at eight decades of struggle and theoretical debate.

Noam Chomsky discusses how his libertarian socialist ideals have evolved since childhood, his vision for a future post-capitalist society, and his views on the state, science, the Enlightenment, and the future of the planet.
